title: The walking Dead 400 days DLC
description:
Hello
This is skidrow's work and I just want to share it here with you guys

I can confirm it is working with nosteam version

Trying following those steps below.
It worked with me and I didn't get any black screen

1.Extract
2.copy WalkingDead106 to C:Program Files(x86)GamesThe.Walking.DeadPack (or where whatever location you have installed it)
  Just make sure you put "WalkingDead106" inside "pack" folder
3.Open WalkingDead106 you have just copied then copy all the content inside and paste it in "default" folder
  C:Program Files (x86)GamesThe.Walking.DeadPackdefault

Have fun and remember to support developers you like when you can
Greetings from TheSolidBoss
